resources.string:
To start using Zen Pets - Doctors, you need to verify your Email Address. 

This is a necessary step for us to know your Email is valid and can receive important Email notifications such as appointments, notices, upgrades / updates, etc from us. 

Press the "Send Verification Email" button to receive the verification email. 

The process may take a few hours to reflect in the system after verification.

Now that you have created your new account on Zen Pets, we need some information about your Clinic / Hospital before your profile can be made public and available for all Zen Pets users. \n\nTo add the Clinic / Hospital information now, click the \"Add Clinic Details\". You can choose to add the information Later too. However, your Clinic / Hospital listing will remain private.
